description:
Would you like to be able to step in front of a camera or webcam at any moment and deliver a confident and engaging presentation?

Do you feel in your bones that putting yourself forward would help your brand, whatever that might be, but you're just too embarrassed to try it?

This course tackles something that ought to be simple - that can turn out to be quite complex - but which is an essential skill in today's communications and marketing world:

Presenting.

The ability to reach out and touch audiences through personal presentation skills, especially on camera, is pretty much the most powerful thing you can do regardless of your field of activity.

Therefore, whether you be a filmmaker, marketer, sales person, press officer, advocacy practitioner, online course maker or one of a zillion other profiles that can employ video to great effect - this course is going to be of huge benefit to you.

Many courses about presenting either take a die-cut approach - for something which is anything but this - or are too fluffy and hard to action.

Captivate Your Audience takes a step by step approach, but it's not didactic. 

The whole point is to harness your energy and inherent skills, and transpose them through to your audience in the most powerful way possible.

Step inside this course, and learn a skill that without doubt will serve you for many years to come. 

You'll see its benefits almost immediately as you become a skilled, confident and powerful communicator and presenter.
title: Captivate Your Audience: Be Powerful and Natural On Camera
